newsitem.title: MALAYSIA: MALAYSIA STOCKS - factors to watch - March 18.
newsitem.headline: MALAYSIA STOCKS - factors to watch - March 18.

text.p: Following are some of the main factors likely to affect Malaysian stocks on Tuesday:
* On Monday, the Dow Jones rose 20.02 points to 6,955.48.
* The Kuala Lumpur Stock Exchange Composite Index of 100 large-capitalisation stocks fell 8.44 to 1,234.03.
* The Second Board index of small-cap stocks rose 8.59 to hit 12-month high of 670.18.
* Shares of correction fluid and engineering components maker Widetech Corp lists on second board with public offer price of 2.10.
* Central bank to issue 1.0 billion ringgit in Bank Negara bills to soak fund liquidity in interbank market.
* Fertiliser and chemical products firm Peladang Kimia reported 19.2 percent rise in net profit for year to 57.28 million ringgit.
